added.name: AVX3Threshold
added.description: Minimum array size in bytes to use AVX512 intrinsicsfor copy, inflate and fill. When this value is set as zerocompare operations can also use AVX512 intrinsics.

added.name: AllowRedefinitionToAddDeleteMethods
added.description: (Deprecated) Allow redefinition to add and delete private static or final methods for compatibility with old releases

added.name: ArchiveClassesAtExit
added.description: The path and name of the dynamic archive file

added.name: DumpSharedMappingsInCore
added.description: If true, sets bit 3 of /proc/PID/coredump_filter, thus resulting in file-backed shared mappings of the process to be dumped into the corefile.

added.name: DynamicDumpSharedSpaces
added.description: Dynamic archive

added.name: ErrorFileToStderr
added.description: If true, error data is printed to stderr instead of a file

added.name: ErrorFileToStdout
added.description: If true, error data is printed to stdout instead of a file

added.name: GCOverheadLimitThreshold
added.description: Number of consecutive collections before gc time limit fires

added.name: HandshakeALot
added.description: Generate a lot of handshakes. This works with GuaranteedSafepointInterval

added.name: JVMCILibDumpJNIConfig
added.description: Dumps to the given file a description of the classes, fields and methods the JVMCI shared library must provide

added.name: JVMCILibPath
added.description: LD path for loading the JVMCI shared library

added.name: MinHeapSize
added.description: Minimum heap size (in bytes); zero means use ergonomics

added.name: ShenandoahLoadRefBarrier
added.description: Turn on/off load-reference barriers in Shenandoah

added.name: SoftMaxHeapSize
added.description: Soft limit for maximum heap size (in bytes)

added.name: UseJVMCINativeLibrary
added.description: Execute JVMCI Java code from a shared library instead of loading it from class files and executing it on the HotSpot heap

added.name: UseLegacyJNINameEscaping
added.description: Use the original JNI name escaping scheme

added.name: VerifyMetaspaceInterval
added.description:
Run periodic metaspace verifications (0 - none,
1 - always, >1 every nth interval)

added.name: ZUncommit
added.description: Uncommit unused memory

added.name: ZUncommitDelay
added.description: Uncommit memory if it has been unused for the specified amount of time (in seconds)

added.name: ZVerifyObjects
added.description: Verify objects

added.name: ZVerifyRoots
added.description: Verify roots

added.name: ZVerifyViews
added.description: Verify heap view accesses

removed.name: AdaptiveSizePolicyGCTimeLimitThreshold
removed.description: Number of consecutive collections before gc time limit fires

removed.name: CIFireOOMAt
removed.description: Fire OutOfMemoryErrors throughout CI for testing the compiler (non-negative value throws OOM after this many CI accesses in each compile)

removed.name: DelayCompilationDuringStartup
removed.description: Delay invoking the compiler until main application class is loaded

removed.name: DisableBCCheck
removed.description: tell sim not to invoke bccheck callback

removed.name: FastSuperclassLimit
removed.description: Depth of hardwired instanceof accelerator array

removed.name: FillDelaySlots
removed.description: Fill delay slots (on SPARC only)

removed.name: IgnoreLibthreadGPFault
removed.description: Suppress workaround for libthread GP fault

removed.name: NeedsDeoptSuspend
removed.comment: // only register window machines need this
removed.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK13
Expired in JDK14

removed.name: NotifySimulator
removed.description: tell the AArch64 sim where we are in method code

removed.name: ProfileIntervals
removed.description: Print profiles for each interval (see ProfileIntervalsTicks)
removed.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK13
Expired in JDK14

removed.name: ProfileIntervalsTicks
removed.description: Number of ticks between printing of interval profile (+ProfileIntervals)
removed.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK13
Expired in JDK14

removed.name: ProfileVM
removed.description: Profile ticks that fall within VM (either in the VM Thread or VM code called through stubs)
removed.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK13
Expired in JDK14

removed.name: ProfilerCheckIntervals
removed.description: Collect and print information on spacing of profiler ticks
removed.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK13
Expired in JDK14

removed.name: ProfilerNumberOfCompiledMethods
removed.description: Number of compiled methods to show in profile
removed.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK13
Expired in JDK14

removed.name: ProfilerNumberOfInterpretedMethods
removed.description: Number of interpreted methods to show in profile
removed.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK13
Expired in JDK14

removed.name: ProfilerNumberOfRuntimeStubNodes
removed.description: Number of runtime stub nodes to show in profile
removed.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK13
Expired in JDK14

removed.name: ProfilerNumberOfStubMethods
removed.description: Number of stub methods to show in profile
removed.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK13
Expired in JDK14

removed.name: ProfilerPCTickThreshold
removed.description: Number of ticks in a PC buckets to be a hotspot

removed.name: ProfilerPrintByteCodeStatistics
removed.description: Print bytecode statistics when dumping profiler output
removed.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK13
Expired in JDK14

removed.name: ProfilerRecordPC
removed.description: Collect ticks for each 16 byte interval of compiled code
removed.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK13
Expired in JDK14

removed.name: ShenandoahAcmpBarrier
removed.description: Turn on/off acmp barriers in Shenandoah

removed.name: ShenandoahDecreaseRegisterPressure
removed.description: Try to reuse after-barrier values to reduce register pressure

removed.name: ShenandoahDontIncreaseWBFreq
removed.description: Common 2 WriteBarriers or WriteBarrier and a ReadBarrier only if the resulting WriteBarrier isn't executed more frequently

removed.name: ShenandoahReadBarrier
removed.description: Turn on/off read barriers in Shenandoah

removed.name: ShenandoahStoreValReadBarrier
removed.description: Turn on/off store val read barriers in Shenandoah

removed.name: ShenandoahWriteBarrier
removed.description: Turn on/off write barriers in Shenandoah

removed.name: TimeCompilationPolicy
removed.description: Time the compilation policy

removed.name: TimeLivenessAnalysis
removed.description: Time computation of bytecode liveness analysis

removed.name: TraceCompilationPolicy
removed.description: Trace compilation policy

removed.name: TraceUncollectedSpeculations
removed.description: Print message when a failed speculation was not collected

removed.name: UseFakeTimers
removed.description: Tell whether the VM should use system time or a fake timer

removed.name: UseImplicitStableValues
removed.description: Mark well-known stable fields as such (e.g. String.value)
removed.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK13
Expired in JDK14

removed.name: UseSimulatorCache
removed.description: tell sim to cache memory updates until exclusive op occurs

removed.name: VerifyMetaspace
removed.description: Verify metaspace on chunk movements.

removed.name: ZOptimizeLoadBarriers
removed.description: Apply load barrier optimizations

removed.name: ZStallOnOutOfMemory
removed.description: Allow Java threads to stall and wait for GC to complete instead of immediately throwing an OutOfMemoryError

removed.name: ZUnmapBadViews
removed.description: Unmap bad (inactive) heap views
